description:
777 (referred to as "Triple Seven" in the English dub) is a product of the Dead Leaves experiments and the bulky, powerful counterpart of 666. Says a quick prayer before going into battle, something 666 admonishes him for, stating it`s a little late for that. Tends to prefer his brute strength and a wide assortment of guns he has at his disposal within his body.
[Taken from Wikipedia]
